forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers this afternoon following a period of morning rain. High 9C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing for the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming less numerous overnight. Low 4C. WSW winds shifting to SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 41F. WSW winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
